sentence.Network_en: They had left school at fifteen and were quite untutored in writing.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们15岁就辍学了，几乎未接受过正式的写作训练。

sentence.Network_en: This untutored mathematician had an obsession with numbers.
sentence.Network_cn: 这位非科班出身的数学家对数字特别痴迷。

sentence.Network_en: Oliver envied the fine person and dignified manners of his untutored brother.
sentence.Network_cn: 奥利佛非常妒忌他这个没受过教育的弟弟长得竟这么好,举止又落落大方.

list.abs: an untutored genius ., 自学成长的天才.
To my untutored ear , your voice sounds almost professional., 照我这外行人听来 , 你的嗓音差不多够专业水平了.
This untutored mathematician has an obsession with numbers ., 这个未开通的数学家有一个对数字的妄想.
that she might think me some untutored youth ., 她也许会把我看作无知少年.

entry.tran: 非科班出身的；未经正式训练的
entry.def: If someone is untutored, they have not been formally trained to do something, although they may be quite skilled at it.

example.ex: This untutored mathematician had an obsession with numbers...
example.tran: 这位非科班出身的数学家对数字特别痴迷。

example.ex: They had left school at fifteen and were quite untutored in writing.
example.tran: 他们15岁就辍学了，几乎未接受过正式的写作训练。

sentences.sentence: "untaught people whose verbal skills are grossly deficient"

auth_sentence.content: There's something feral and untutored about his schoolyard ways.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: There's something feral and untutored about his schoolyard ways.

auth_sentence.content: Such lyrical lack of guile is matched by an endearingly untutored choice of influences.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: Such lyrical lack of guile is matched by an endearingly untutored choice of influences.

auth_sentence.content: To the untutored eye, an impervious author looks just the same as an infuriated one.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: To the untutored eye, an impervious author looks just the same as an infuriated one.
